lines.gurmukhi: joeI pRBu BwvY qwih sovq jgwvY jwie jwgq ibhwvY jwie qwih n bulwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Joee Prabhu Bhaavai Taahi Sovat Jagaavai Jaai , Jaagat Bihaavai Jaai Taahi N Bulaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A woman-like seeker whom He likes, Lord goes and wakes her up. But one who spends the night awake, He does not go and talk to her.

lines.gurmukhi: joeI pRBu BwvY qwih mwnin mnwvY Dwie syvk s√çrUp syvw krq n BwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Joee Prabhu Bhaavai Taahi Maanani Manaavai Dhaai , Sayvak Svaroop Sayvaa Karat N Bhaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The seeker woman who is liked by Him, and even if she is proud and arrogant, He rushes to please her and bring her around. On the other hand, a seeker woman may be seen doing service outwardly, she may not be liked by Him even then.

lines.gurmukhi: joeI pRBu BwvY qwih rIJ kY irJwvY Awpw kwiC kwiC AwvY qwih pg n lgwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Joee Prabhu Bhaavai Taahi Reejh Kai Rijhaavai Aapaa , Kaachhi Kaachhi Aavai Taahi Pag N Lagaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The seeker woman whom Lord likes and becomes kind upon her, He pleases her but one who adorns herself and come to Him with ego-filled mind, He does not even let her touch His feet.

lines.gurmukhi: joeI pRBu BwvY qwih sbY bn AwvY qw kI mihmw Apwr n khq bn AwveI ]594]
lines.transliteration_english: Joee Prabhu Bhaavai Taahi Sabai Ban Aavai Taa Kee , Mahimaa Apaar N Kahat Ban Aavaee ?594?

Shabad OS B.translation: A seeker woman whom He likes, all efforts and labour bear fruit. Her grandeur is beyond and difficult to express.  (594)
